Should we create separate pixels for each account/niche?

It's generally a good practice to create separate pixels for each account or niche. This helps in better tracking and optimization of your campaigns. For more detailed guidelines, you can refer to our article on creating separate ad accounts: [How to create separate ad accounts](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/20333724725133-How-to-create-separate-ad-accounts).
